title: Photogrammetry
description: Creating accurate 3D models from multiple photographs using structure from motion algorithms.

title: Camera Matching
description: Techniques for matching virtual cameras to real-world photographs and footage for accurate scene recreation.

title: Camera Tracking
description: Tracking camera movement in video footage to recreate motion paths in 3D space.

title: Image-Based Modeling
description: Creating 3D models directly from 2D images without traditional modeling techniques.

title: Depth Map Modeling
description: Using depth information from images or sensors to create accurate 3D geometry.

title: Gaussian Splatting
description: Modern 3D reconstruction technique using Gaussian functions for photorealistic rendering.

title: Boolean Modeling
description: Using boolean operations (union, intersection, difference) to create complex shapes from primitives.

title: Modular Modeling
description: Building complex scenes by assembling reusable modular components and assets.

title: Precision Modeling
description: Creating highly accurate models with precise measurements and dimensions for forensic applications.

title: Procedural Modeling
description: Using algorithms and rules to generate complex geometry and textures procedurally.

title: AI Mesh Generation
description: Using artificial intelligence to automatically generate and optimize 3D meshes from various inputs.

title: Retopology & Mesh Optimization
description: Improving mesh topology and optimizing geometry for better performance and animation.

title: Establishing Scale & Dimension
description: Setting up accurate scale and dimensions in 3D scenes for realistic measurements and analysis.

title: Rigging & Animation
description: Creating rigs and animations for 3D models to simulate movement and interactions.

title: Terrain & Landscape Generation
description: Creating realistic terrain and landscapes for environmental context in investigations.
